content:
Hi! I'm new to FHIR here. Is there anyone i can quiz on about using the codes from this form: http://hl7.org/fhir/valueset-coverage-type.html ?

Is it correct in this form ( http://hl7.org/fhir/valueset-coverage-type.html ) to use the "EHCPOL" code if the patient has a Russian voluntary health insurance policy, and the "MANDPOL" code if the patient has Russian compulsory health insurance policy?
